name: expressjs-demo-app--parent
description: Parent package for both the Demo App React frontend and the Express backend server. This is a set convenience scripts for running the demo from the project root directory.
author: Wristband

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm start --prefix frontend" "npm run dev --prefix backend"
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix frontend; npm run lint --prefix backend
scripts.setup: npm run clean; npm install; npm install --prefix frontend; npm install --prefix backend; npm run build
